name: Room of Fire
description:
You awake to find yourself in a small, locked room. Your captor was once your friend, but your drunken lust betrayed the bond of brotherhood. Now, you must find a way to escape the suffocating walls built by his need for revenge. Your fate rests on your interpretation of letters left by a man with a broken heart. Think fast! Your time and air are limited.

WADS - move player

Mouse - move view

E - pick up and discard items

Space - Jump
